Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பகைநட்பாக் கொண்டொழுகும் பண்புடை யாளன் தகைமைக்கண் தங்கிற்று உலகு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The world abides in the greatness of that good-natured man who behaves so as to turn hatred into friendship.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person of great character ('பண்புடையாளன்') stands between two warring factions. They are not fighting.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Instead, they are performing an act of great diplomatic skill, turning the enmity into friendship ('பகை நட்பாக்கொண்டு'). This is visualized as them taking the two opposing factions' sharp, crossed swords of hatred and skillfully re-forging them into a single, beautiful, unbreakable ring of friendship.
Layered_Composition.Background: The entire world ('உலகு'), personified as a celestial being, is shown resting peacefully and securely upon the foundation of this person's great and noble character ('தகைமைக்கண் தங்கிற்று'). Their peacemaking is what supports the world.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The world itself is sustained by the greatness of the person who has the character to turn enmity into friendship.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The re-forging of swords into a friendship ring is the central metaphor. The world resting on this person's character shows their fundamental importance.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A warm, golden light of peace and creation emanates from the forge where the swords are being transformed. The person has a serene, powerful aura.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide, epic shot that shows the peacemaker, their symbolic act, and the world being sustained by it.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Mythological art, with a strong allegorical message.

Cultural_Anchors: The world rests on their greatness ('தகைமைக்கண் தங்கிற்று உலகு')
